channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stocks Keep Climbing as Fed Cuts Rates
item.description: Big tech stocks push higher, while the financial and industrial sectors pull back after Wednesdayâ€™s big gains; Lyft jumps 22%.

item.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq Higher Ahead of Interest-Rate Decision
item.description: Major stock indexes were higher. The Nasdaq Composite rallied over 1%, and the S&P 500 posted smaller gains. The Dow industrials was little changed.

item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery adds 7.2 million Max subscribers, the streamer's largest single-quarter jump
item.description: Warner Bros. Discovery said its streaming platform Max added 7.2 million subscribers during the third quarter.

item.title: Gold Bounces Back After Post-Election Selloff
item.description: Front-month gold futures settled nearly 1.2% higher, up two of the past three sessions. The uptick comes after gold shed 2.7% in the previous session,...

item.title: Adyen shares slide as payments giant's transaction volume growth slows
item.description: Adyen shares sank Thursday after the company reported a slowdown in the growth of its transaction volumes in the third quarter.

item.title: AppLovin, top tech stock of the year, soars another 45% on earnings beat
item.description: AppLovin was already the best-performing tech stock of 2024, and that was before the stock popped on a big earnings beat.

item.title: Moderna posts surprise profit as Covid vaccine sales impress, cost cuts take hold
item.description: Moderna said its newest Covid vaccine saw benefits after winning approval in the U.S. three weeks earlier than the last iteration of the shot did in 2...

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Falls as Storage Builds Continue
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures settled lower amid further storage builds ahead of the high-demand winter season, with inventories rising by 69 Bcf last week...

item.title: Treasury Yields And Dollar Get Some Support From Fed's Expected Cut
item.description: The dollar cut some losses as the Fed reduced rates by 25 basis points, as expected.

item.title: E.l.f. shares soar as cosmetics retailer raises guidance after posting 40% sales gain
item.description: E.l.f. Beauty raised its full year guidance after posting a 40% jump in sales.
